subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders’ first-round draft choice in 2006, Kyle Okposo’s decision to turn pro has become a big issue because of its timing and the role the Islanders might have played in it.
snippet: The Islanders’ first-round draft choice in 2006, Kyle Okposo’s decision to turn pro has become a big issue because of its timing and the role the Islanders might have played in it.
